products.title: Bella Blackout Rock Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Rock Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. 
 The Bella Blackout Rock roller blind in a lovely grey colour will suit almost any room. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1859 Fabric Colour: Rock Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Mid Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Mid Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! Loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. 
 
This mid-grey electric roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This electric roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Our electric roller blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart or the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2042 Fabric Colour: Mid Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Pebble Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Pebble Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £140.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This soft Pebble Grey electric roller blind is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our electric rollers are great for privacy and light control, and due to their chain-free design, are inherently child-safe! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This medium grey electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2134 Fabric Colour: Pebble Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
